Description:
The Epitome of Doncaster Apartment Living!
From every perspective, this 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom ground floor apartment is in a league of its own. Situated within the Acadia complex and celebrating modern Doncaster living, this home ticks all the boxes providing space, convenience and style in an unbeatable location.
Graced with private street access, floorboards throughout and north-northeastern aspect providing year round exceptional natural light, this ground floor apartment is truly spectacular.
As you enter, you are immediately greeted by a spacious open plan living and dining area which flows on to the gourmet kitchen boasting SMEG appliances, push to open cabinetry and quality stone bench tops. Leading from the lounge room through bifold doors is a generous 110sqm (approx.) wrap around courtyard area complete with timber deck. Rarely found in apartment living, this low maintenance private outdoor space is perfect for alfresco dining and summer BBQ’s.
The master bedroom suite is an idyllic retreat with double built-in robes, plush carpets and lavish ensuite with shower. The second bedroom is also robed with ensuite access to the main bathroom. The multipurpose room has versatility and could be used as a second lounge room, study or home office.
A wonderful blend of modern style, functionality and practicality, the home also comprises reverse cycle heating and cooling, internal laundry and direct access to a secure single car space and storage unit.
Perfect for professional couples, savvy investors and downsizers, the home is ideally located within walking distance to Westfield Doncaster, public transport, Doncaster Secondary College, and offers easy access to the Eastern Freeway/Eastlink.

Description:
Minutes Walk to Westfield Doncaster!
Rising up to take in views of both The Macedon and Dandenong Ranges, this expansive 4-bedroom residence impresses with lavish sized living rooms, a stunning commercial style kitchen with a statement British made Stoves cooker, and a palatial master bedroom with a spa bath ensuite. Elegantly detailed by corniced ceilings, arched windows and Jarrah floating floors, this is a home designed to deliver refinement. A grand formal lounge with an open fireplace and a dramatic dining room sets the scene for winter warmth and entertaining, with a radiant family room and a rumpus with wet bar offering yet more living space, and a versatile front office serving as a quiet corner for work and study. The showpiece kitchen awaits creative cuisine with a 7-burner cooking station with double ovens, illuminated display cabinets and a coffee bar. Generous sized bedrooms and bathrooms cater to the growing family's desire for space. Total comfort is assured by central heating and cooling and wall mounted reverse cycle split systems powered by 6 north facing solar panels. A double remote garage offers secure entry via the rear courtyard and laundry. It's time to enjoy all the spoils of a spacious family home in its quiet cul de sac on the doorstep of Westfield Doncaster, with picturesque new Winbrook Reserve and playground across the road and a walkway at the bottom of the street through to Westfield's fashion and dining hub. A fully landscaped Zen garden adds the finishing touch with new retaining walls, a paved patio and a border of flowering magnolias. A heartland location in the DDO8 has you zoned for top ranking Doncaster Primary and Doncaster Secondary, close to the Eastern Freeway, Aquarena Swimming Pool and the Eastern Golf Club.

Description:
Calling All Families!
Offering a fabulous mix of formal and communal settings, zoned accommodation and a solid blue-chip location in the heart of Doncaster, the growing family may just have discovered their perfect upgrade option with this light and bright four-bedroom home.
As a resident of this coveted neighbourhood, you'll quickly discover why the area is renowned for offering a premium family lifestyle. Schramms Reserve, Ruffey Lake Park, Doncaster Primary School, Doncaster Secondary College, Westfield Shoppingtown, Manningham Library and bus services are only a short walk away, while the close proximity of the Eastern Freeway is particularly beneficial for the city commuter.
This impeccably well-presented home is most certainly defined by its spacious character, with three separate living zones on hand to cater for your growing family's needs. And if you factor in the versatile room that hides underneath the decked alfresco, you have a practical fourth living area, fifth bedroom option or peaceful home office at your service.
The excellent presentation of the formal lounge (with bar) and elevated dining on entry sets the tone for the home's proud appearance, while the generous proportions of the well-appointed kitchen is in keeping with the home's impressive size and scale.
The vastness of the stately rumpus adds another layer of harmonious family living, while its seamless integration with the all-seasons north-facing deck presents a dream indoor-outdoor centrepiece ideal for large scale entertaining.
Bedrooms enjoy space and comfort, particularly the Master bedroom with its 'his and hers' built-in robes and ensuite (with double shower), while the presence of a double shower and spa bath in the main family bathroom, large laundry with excellent storage options, north-facing backyard, garden shed, security alarm, ducted heating, air-conditioning and off-street parking for four cars and a boat, caravan or trailer accentuates the appeal of this excellent upgrade.

Description:
Position, Privacy and Your Own Backyard
Enjoying a peaceful position at the rear of a safe and secure complex, this spacious and immaculately presented apartment benefits from a rare design focus that is far from the norm. Your eye is immediately drawn to the unique curvature of the East facing balcony as you enter the home, which connects seamlessly with the bright open plan living, kitchen and dining space. With plenty of room for the couches, dining table and chairs, the living/dining area is a real highlight. Incorporating split-system heating and cooling, wooden floorboards and access to the sparkling kitchen, it's a place you'll love spending time. Caesar stone bench tops compliment stainless steel gas cooking, an under bench oven and range hood in an open kitchen that has a breakfast bar and ample storage. Past the convenient placed European laundry, two spacious bedrooms at the rear have dual built-in robes and are central to the modern main bathroom which has a separate corner shower, bath and vanity. Perhaps the pinnacle of this impressive package is reserved for outside where not only does the almost property length balcony provide a pleasant place to sit and relax but incorporates a small staircase that leads down to a private backyard. Something rarely seen attached to an apartment of this calibre, this outdoor space has a paved seating area, privately planted trees, storage shed and a barked play space - meaning both the kids and pets will be happy out here. The additions of a secure underground car park and storage cage, stylish fixtures and fittings and modern window furnishings further separate this apartment from the rest. Located walking distance to the magnificent Westfield Shoppingtown, close to Doncaster primary and secondary schooling and public transport, and with great connection to Doncaster Road, Eastland and the city via Eastlink, this exciting offering must appeal to both investors and those looking to take their first step onto the property ladder.
